title: Privacy Policy
intro: At Lustra, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.body: We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy.

subsections.title: Personal Information
items: Profile photos you upload for analysis
Dating profile text and bio content
Email address for account creation and communication
Usage data and app interaction patterns
Device information and technical data

subsections.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: App usage statistics and analytics
Device identifiers and operating system information
IP address and location data (if permitted)
Crash reports and performance data

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To provide AI-powered profile optimization and recommendations
To analyze photos and provide improvement suggestions
To generate personalized bio and messaging recommendations
To improve our app functionality and user experience
To provide customer support and respond to inquiries
To send important updates and notifications about our services
To prevent fraud and ensure app security

sections.title: Data Security
sections.body: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:
items: End-to-end encryption for all data transmission
Secure cloud storage with restricted access
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Multi-factor authentication for our internal systems
Automatic data anonymization for research purposes

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.body: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
To trusted service providers who assist in app operations (under strict confidentiality agreements)
When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
In connection with a business transaction (merger, acquisition, etc.)

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.body: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time through the app settings or by contacting our support team.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.body: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to correct or update inaccurate information
Right to delete your personal data
Right to restrict processing of your data
Right to data portability
Right to withdraw consent at any time

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.body: Lustra is intended for users aged 18 and older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we discover that a child under 18 has provided us with personal information, we will promptly delete such information.

sections.title: International Users
sections.body: If you are using Lustra from outside the United States, please note that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States. By using our services, you consent to this transfer and processing.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.body: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable law. We will notify you of any material changes through the app or by email. Your continued use of Lustra after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
